contents.text: Welcome to Ambient.ai in South Bay, where we pioneer next-generation Vision AI solutions.
For sales and partnership inquiries, press 1.
For new customer demos and pricing information, press 1.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our sales team.

navigationGoals: I need a demo of your Vision AI platform and details on pricing plans.
I’d like to schedule a demo and get pricing for your Vision AI system to support veteran community programs.
Schedule a hands-on Vision AI demo and get enterprise pricing tiers for deployment.
I’d like to see a product demo and get pricing information for your system.
Schedule a demo and obtain pricing information for Ambient.ai solutions for my university research group

contents.text: For partnership opportunities and collaborations, press 2.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: I want to discuss a collaboration opportunity and partnership terms.
I’m exploring a partnership between my veteran support organization and Ambient.ai.
Discuss integrating Ambient.ai’s computer vision SDK into our product as a strategic partner.
I want to discuss a potential partnership with Ambient.ai for my senior care service.
Discuss a potential research collaboration between Ambient.ai and my physics lab for an upcoming grant

contents.text: For technical support and customer care, press 2.
If you need help with deployment or troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our technical support engineers.

navigationGoals: I need help troubleshooting deployment of your solution in our environment.
I need help deploying and troubleshooting the AI solution we purchased for our veteran outreach center.
Troubleshoot a Vision AI on-premises node that’s failing to detect events after deployment.
I need help troubleshooting and setting up the cameras in my home.
Troubleshoot deployment issues with the Ambient.ai vision model on our lab’s camera system

contents.text: For developer resources and API assistance, press 2.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our developer support team.

navigationGoals: I want assistance with API integration and access to developer resources.
I need API documentation and developer guidance to integrate Ambient.ai into our veteran service platform.
Obtain the developer API reference and code samples for real-time object detection integration.
I’m looking for API documentation and guidance to integrate your system with my home automation.
Get assistance with the Ambient.ai API and SDK to integrate object detection into my experiment code
